A4.text: He is the first Indian citizen to travel in space.

A5.text: There have been other astronauts of Indian origin who travelled to space, who were not Indian citizens.

A6.text: Kalpana Chawla was the first woman of Indian origin to go into space.

A7.text: Kalpana Chawla was a mission specialist and robotic arm operator aboard STS-87.
